properties.name: Pretzel Park Farmers' Market
properties.hours_sat_exceptions: Winter markets are on the first Saturday of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar & Apr) from 11:00 a.m. - 1:00 p.m.

properties.name: Rittenhouse Farmers' Market
properties.hours_sat_exceptions: Closed July 1st. Last week of November to April, Sat market hours are 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.

properties.name: Sankofa Farmstand
properties.payment_other_low_cost: Community members may volunteer at our 2nd and 4th Saturday volunteer workdays and obtain produce in kind

properties.name: East Falls Farmers' Market

properties.payment_other_low_cost: The McCann's Farm offers 'Bag of the Best' - a CSA style bag with pre-chosen veggies for only  $10 and $20
